title: Establish, Maintain, or Revise an Honor Code

content.question: Write an essay that synthesizes information from at least three of the sources and develops your position on whether your school should establish, maintain, revise, or eliminate an honor code or honor system.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that synthesizes information from at least three of the sources and develops your position on whether your school should establish, maintain, revise, or eliminate an honor code or honor system.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Write introductions and conclusions appropriate to the purpose and context of the rhetorical situation.
